com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.server

Class DirectorySnapshotHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.server.DirectorySnapshotHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryChangeHandler

    public class DirectorySnapshotHandler
extends Object
implements DirectoryChangeHandler
    This class manages a directory watcher. It will also expire directories if there are no interested clients. Expire means stop watching the directories.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectorySnapshotHandler(DirectoryWatcher directoryWatcher, DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender directorySnapshotNotificationSender, int pollPeriod, int directoryInterestExpiryTime)
      Manages directory interest events from clients and filters these through to a directory watcher.

      Sends a directory Snapshot notification out.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectorySnapshotHandler

        public DirectorySnapshotHandler(DirectoryWatcher directoryWatcher,
                                DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender directorySnapshotNotificationSender,
                                int pollPeriod,
                                int directoryInterestExpiryTime)
        Manages directory interest events from clients and filters these through to a directory watcher. Also manages directory expiry. Directory expiry occurs if no clients are interested in the directory.
        Parameters:
        directoryWatcher - The directory watcher object that handles the low level directory watch.
        directorySnapshotNotificationSender - Snapshot change notifications are sent via this interface.
        pollPeriod - The directory poll period.
        directoryInterestExpiryTime - If no clients register an interest in a directory within this time period then the directory expires which means its not being polled anymore.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the DirectorySnapshotHandler, and the directory poll thread.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the DirectorySnapshotHandler and the directory poll thread.

      • registerInterestInDirectory

        public void registerInterestInDirectory(Path path)
        Registers an interest in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the directory the client is interested in.

      • directorySnapshotChanged

        public void directorySnapshotChanged(Path path,
                                     List<FileInfo> directorySnapshot)
        Sends a directory Snapshot notification out.
        Specified by:
        directorySnapshotChanged in interface DirectoryChangeHandler
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the directory the client is interested in.
        directorySnapshot - The current directory snapshot that triggered this change.

      • currentlySendingData

        public void currentlySendingData(Path path,
                                 boolean sendingData)
        Informs this class whether or not data is being sent from this path. If data is being sent from this path then we should not expire this path. It may take longer than the directory expire time to send the data.
        Parameters:
        path - The path data is or is not being sent from.
        sendingData - If true then data is being sent from this path. If false then data is not being sent from this path.
